Class DefaultMonitoringCheckBuilder

com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode
io.github.jnodorp.jiffybox.internal.DefaultMonitoringCheckBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.fasterxml.jackson.core.TreeNode, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonSerializable, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.JsonNodeCreator, MonitoringCheckBuilder, Serializable, Iterable<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>
public class DefaultMonitoringCheckBuilder extends com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode implements MonitoringCheckBuilder
A monitoring check consists of an id, a name, a jiffy box, an ip, a check type, a check interval, a reminder interval, a retry tolerance, a status, a port, a path, a username, a password and a list of contact groups. This class is the only class which is used as a builder. Monitoring checks are too complex to build using parametrized API calls. To create a monitoring check call the needed setter methods on a new monitoring check instance and use the readily set up instance as the argument for the final API call.
See Also:

    • DefaultMonitoringCheckBuilder

      public DefaultMonitoringCheckBuilder(String name, String ip, MonitoringCheckType checkType, Integer port)
      Set the name, ip and checkType.
      Parameters:
      name - The monitoring checks name. Up to 30 characters are allowed. Valid characters are a-zA-Z0-9üöäÜÖÄß_()=!\*@.- and spaces.
      ip - IP address, the monitoring check is bound to.
      checkType - The monitoring checks type. Possible types are: portUdp, http, https, smtp, pop3, imap, ftp, ssh, mysql, dns.
      port - Mandatory for: all; Optional for: -
